mapper.insert: insert into TB_COMBO (COMBO_ID, COMBO_NAME, COMBO_PRICE, COMBO_SITE, COMBO_TYPE, COMBO_DAYS, INSTRUCTION_ID, NOTICE_ID, COMBO_IMG1, COMBO_IMG2, COMBO_IMG3, COMBO_IMG4, COMBO_IMG5, COMBO_LIGHT) values (#{comboId}, #{comboName}, #{comboPrice}, #{comboSite}, #{comboType}, #{comboDays}, #{instructionId}, #{noticeId}, #{comboImg1}, #{comboImg2}, #{comboImg3}, #{comboImg4}, #{comboImg5}, #{comboLight,jdbcType=CLOB})

mapper.update:
update TB_COMBO
COMBO_NAME = #{comboName},
COMBO_PRICE = #{comboPrice},
COMBO_SITE = #{comboSite},
COMBO_TYPE = #{comboType},
COMBO_DAYS = #{comboDays},
INSTRUCTION_ID = #{instructionId},
NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId},
COMBO_IMG1 = #{comboImg1},
COMBO_IMG2 = #{comboImg2},
COMBO_IMG3 = #{comboImg3},
COMBO_IMG4 = #{comboImg4},
COMBO_IMG5 = #{comboImg5},
COMBO_LIGHT = #{comboLight,jdbcType=CLOB},
where COMBO_ID = #{comboId}

update TB_COMBO set COMBO_NAME = #{comboName}, COMBO_PRICE = #{comboPrice}, COMBO_SITE = #{comboSite}, COMBO_TYPE = #{comboType}, COMBO_DAYS = #{comboDays}, INSTRUCTION_ID = #{instructionId}, NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}, COMBO_IMG1 = #{comboImg1}, COMBO_IMG2 = #{comboImg2}, COMBO_IMG3 = #{comboImg3}, COMBO_IMG4 = #{comboImg4}, COMBO_IMG5 = #{comboImg5}, COMBO_LIGHT = #{comboLight,jdbcType=CLOB} where COMBO_ID = #{comboId}

update TB_COMBO set COMBO_NAME = #{comboName}, COMBO_PRICE = #{comboPrice}, COMBO_SITE = #{comboSite}, COMBO_TYPE = #{comboType}, COMBO_DAYS = #{comboDays}, INSTRUCTION_ID = #{instructionId}, NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}, COMBO_IMG1 = #{comboImg1}, COMBO_IMG2 = #{comboImg2}, COMBO_IMG3 = #{comboImg3}, COMBO_IMG4 = #{comboImg4}, COMBO_IMG5 = #{comboImg5} where COMBO_ID = #{comboId}
